qas.question: Are there internal travel restrictions in nicaragua?

answers.text: There are no specific travel restrictions currently in force in Nicaragua.
Flights to and from Nicaragua are currently limited.

paragraphs.context: Flights to and from Nicaragua are currently limited. Avianca has started a limited series of flights to Miami and details are available directly from the airline or via a travel agent. There have been reports of the land borders being closed at short or no notice. There is currently a requirement to have a â€œnegative for COVID-19â€ certificate. There are no specific travel restrictions currently in force in Nicaragua. You should follow all precautionary health measures and keep up to date with information from your tour operator, transport or accommodation provider, and comply with measures introduced by the authorities.
